name: Nekomancer (Sozey)
description:
In this game, you face other cats for your honour. 

Play as your favourite cat among Chonk the Formidable, Garfield the Devourer or Nobiko the Elongated. 

Your mission is to eliminate the tyranic shogun carrying a reign of terror on the land. For that, you will need to defeat his armies and access the castle. There's a slight issue though... The castle is locked behind heavy doors and you can't find anyone to come with you to activate the opening mechanisms, let alone to fight. Fortunately, your precious magic wand, the Fish Stick, allows you to bring back the souls of those you killed. 
Purrhaps they can help you in your quest...
